name: Elaine (itch) (Kat)
description:
Where are you, Elaine?

Priscilla's friend went missing. Can you find her before it's too late?

Elaine is a short investigation puzzle / adventure game where you have to explore certain locations in order to figure out what actually happened. The original version was made for the 5th Annual Driftwood Jam hosted by Driftwood Gaming. The current build is the remastered and final version of the game.

Enjoy!
